title: Games Showcase App
description:
This is a web application developed to display video games from all major platforms. By integrating the rawg.io API, the app allows users to search and filter games by platform, genre, name, etc. It features a PLP for browsing games and a PDP that provides description, trailers, screenshots, metacritic scores and more.

 This project demonstrates my skills in responsive design, API integration, and creating intuitive user interfaces. You can view a live demo of the app and explore the source code on GitHub.

title: CRUD App
description:
The Task Manager CRUD Application is a robust web application designed to demonstrate comprehensive frontend development skills in interacting with backend services. Built with React, the app allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks seamlessly. By developing and integrating a custom RESTful API, the application ensures real-time data management and persistence. Key features include responsive design, intuitive user interfaces, form validation, error handling, and smooth navigation across different views.

This project highlights proficiency in API development & integration, state management, and building user-centric applications. You can view a live demo of the Task Manager and explore the source code on GitHub.

title: Project 3
description:
The Responsive Carousel is a fully adaptable carousel component developed using vanilla React, without relying on any external libraries. It seamlessly supports all HTML elements, including custom components, tables, and divs, showcasing its versatility and flexibility. The carousel features intuitive finger-following swipe gestures for both mobile and desktop devices and supports infinite looping.

 This project demonstrates my expertise in building complex, high-performance UI components from scratch, emphasizing clean code and responsiveness. You can view a live demo of the carousel and explore the source code on GitHub.
